posts.message:
Benchmark for 
#Angular1 #angular2 #React #VirtualDom #IncrementalDom #Citojs #Mithril #ember #ember2
TL;DR
1- Virtual Dom is the core advantage that react has over angular.
2- Virtual Dom has issues, so google developed incremental Dom library with similar apis to VD, still, no framework yet implemented it!
3- We see on the horizon Mithril, faster n lighter  -7.8KB- than react n angular2 with component tree base architecture, but, weaker community compared to react n angular.
4- react is UI library, just that, to use it u have to learn redux n jsx to be able to build frontend apps, unlike angular2, fewer concepts, less code to get the job done!
5- React n angular both have growing support for native mobile apps, react-Native n nativescript.
posts.caption: auth0.com

posts.message: سلام عليكم..  لو حد بيشتغل freelancer و هيقبض باليورو..  ايه احسن بنك يفتح فيه حساب يتحول عليه و ينفع ياخد فلوسه باليورو؟  عن تجربة يا ريت.

A #review about  #Ember #knockout #Backbone #Vue #react in comparison to #angular1 and #angular2
=================================
Knockout, Backbone
Both get the work done, but they are outdated solutions compared to angular n Vuejs.
=================================
Ember
modern framework, has a lovely CLI, a lot better than the previous ones, but, we didn't click, so moving on :D
=================================
Vuejs
i loved it, a 16kb framework that accomplishes everything u need in a frontend framework with the best declarative approaches, it's so simple, u can learn it in 2 hour max. it felt like a mix between the good stuff in angular 1 n angular2... it's a lot better than angular1 and it has a lovely debugging tool!
I would use it for websites and small webapps, yet, not as powerful as angular2 of course!
=================================
React
WTFFFFFFFFFFFF, it's freaking ugly, if there's an election between react and angular2, elderly people will elect React, that's how i feel about it :D
=================================
angular1.x
it's has been 6 years, thank u for ur services, i would say it's gonna be around for more 4 years, i wouldn't build any new apps with it unless it's a low budget or short-term project!
=================================
angular2
way more futuristic than all of them, it's the best ecosystem for you as a developer and the best output for your users, i'm totally investing my next few months mastering it!

posts.description:
المقال التاني من سلسلة Scratching the surface of programming.

اتكلمت فيه عن الـ JavaScript وليه اختارتها اكمل بيها بقيت المقالات وإيه هي الـ JavaScript في الأساس, ومعني الـ input و الـ output في البرمجة ومهدت للمقال التالت إللي هاتكلم فيه عن الـ variables, Data Types, Whitespaces and Comments
يارب يكون سهل وبسيط.
